document_data.name: Boffo Arglebargle Cosgrove Bullwubble II
document_data.mainbody: '''Boffo Arglebargle Cosgrove Bullwubble II''' was a male [[gnome]] [[fighter]] and owner of the tavern called the [[Furniture's Fate]] in the town of [[Thunderstone]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Boffo, being an eccentric prankster, was usually at the center of brawls in the aptly named Furniture's Fate. When he wasn't, he usually had his bouncer [[Stig]] lift him up and hurl the gnome into the fray.
